amendment.description: An amendment numbered 410 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to waive current laws requirement that FEMA or federal land management agencies reimburse DOD (with civilian funds) for cost of military support for disaster response to major wildfires or federally declared disasters/emergencies.
